original_text: So we must go on a journey for three days into the desert. We will offer sacrifices to the Lord our God there, as he has told us to do.’
korean_text: 우리가 사흘길쯤 광야로 들어가서 우리 하나님 여호와께 제사를 드리되 우리에게 명령하시는 대로 하려 하나이다

sentences.original_text: So we must go on a journey
for three days into the desert
We will offer sacrifices to the Lord our God there
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 그곳에서 주 우리 하나님께 제물을 드릴 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as he has told us to do
